title: Do you think Lee will ever get a rework? (Rek'sai, Heimer type of rework)
body: I got God Fist Lee Sin in a crate but I hate the champ as it is right now, plus the community built around it is shit. Wondering if I should keep or disenchant

replies.body:
He'd be pretty low on our list of champions to target with an ability update like the ones you listed. I wouldn't let that way into your decision to keep the crate or not atm.

Plans can change, but can't think of anything we really want to change with him right now.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/40zsGgn0-riot-can-ahris-foxfire-get-some-kind-of-qol-on-the-targeting-side

Can you give some feedback on this topic, would much appreciate it :)

heres an idea
move damage from R>Q1>Q2 to auto attacks.
reduce base damage of R and Q then give his passive enchanted auto's like 10% more damage or something.

Something that never sat right with me was how Lee could just R>Q>Q you when ahead and basically destroy 70% of your life with next to no room for counterplay. I'd also change Ironwill from Lifesteal and spellvamp to Omninvamp because I mean...In most cases it wont matter but it basically does the same thing.
